bug.author: iizukak
bug.summary: Object Detection tutorial command failed when validation dataset path is empty.
bug.description: When validation dataset is empty. Under the error occured. <denchmark-code>FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/blueoil/dataset/annotations-bbox.csv' </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I have tried on another dataset. And not just Object Detection but all dataset got this error.
